item.description:
Comic fans: Boston Comic Con lands in April, and as I will likely be there for the majority of the weekend, I suggest we meet up on Saturday, have lunch, and then enjoy the con. It's taking place at Hynes Convention Center, which is surrounded by roughly 1.4 million eat, and lunch location can be tbd based on how many people are interested! More details about the con are available at www.bostoncomiccon.com.

Â 

UPDATE: Due to the number of people RSVPed, I think our best bet is to do the food court at the Prudential mall, which adjoins to the Hynes Convention Center. Meet near the St. Francis Chapel (its next to the Dunkin Donuts) just outside the Pru's Hynes Convention Center entrance at 12:30 and we'll head over for food and comic talk.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet near the St Francis Chapel outside of the Hynes Convention Center entrance in the Prudential mall.
item.name: Boston Comic Con 2012 - Lunch & Meetup
